column2: At this juncture the Petitioners have sought to quash the said notice
of  inquiry  before  this  Court  under  Writ  Application  No.  1880/2001,  by
seeking Writ of Certiorari.  They also sought Writ of Prohibition  preventing
Sri  Lanka  Customs  proceeding  with  the  inquiry.  The  Respondents  have

column1: judgment on 16.05.2007.  With the delivery of its judgment, this Court had

column2: decided to dismiss the Petitioner's application.
